channel.title: Can't load MoparScape
channel.description:
I'm having major problems. I'm a first time user of any of the clients on this website and I'd really like to figure this out.
I try to load the webclient and I get this error:
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.moparscape.c.a(Unknown Source) at org.moparscape.c.b(Unknown Source) at org.moparscape.c.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.moparscape.c.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.moparscape.k.a(Unknown Source) at org.moparscape.Applet.init(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Could not load client, exiting...
And when I try to use the downloaded client it just closes after a few seconds of run time. When I try and add a server IP to the webclient it just says bad input and doesn't let me.
Any information on this topic and how I can fix this would be greatly appreciated thank-you!!

That doesn’t help me at all. I’d like someone that knows what they’re talking about to give it a shot thanks…

item.title: Can't load MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @ILL.MatiC ILL.MatiC
item.description:
@ILL.MatiC wrote:

I’m having major problems. I’m a first time user of any of the clients on this website and I’d really like to figure this out.

I try to load the webclient and I get this error:

java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.jar.JarFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.jar.JarFile.(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.c.a(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.c.b(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.c.(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.c.(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.k.a(Unknown Source)
at org.moparscape.Applet.init(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Could not load client, exiting…

And when I try to use the downloaded client it just closes after a few seconds of run time. When I try and add a server IP to the webclient it just says bad input and doesn’t let me.

Any information on this topic and how I can fix this would be greatly appreciated thank-you!!

Read full topic
